CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE categories (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT UNIQUE, risk TEXT, liquidity TEXT, created_at DATETIME, updated_at DATETIME)
INSERT: INSERT INTO categories (name, risk, liquidity, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ($name, $risk, $liquidity, $created_at, $updated_at)
UPDATE: UPDATE categories SET name = $name, risk = $risk, liquidity = $liquidity, updated_at = $updated_at WHERE id = $id
